title: The Other Side Of Burqa Az Pase Borghe ( 2004) Documentary

sources.title: The Other Side Of Burqa Az Pase Borghe ( 2004) Documentary
sources.description: Title: The Other Side of Burka - Az pase borghe (2004) Directed by: Mehrdad Oskouei Date of birth: 12 September 1969 Teheran, Iran Writing credits: Mehrdad Oskouei Music: Ali Samadpour Year: 2004 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 52 min. Synopsis On the Iranian island of Qeshm, women wear a “burka”, a pinching mask of black bands pressing against the eyebrows and nose. The interviewed women don’t remove this outward sign of oppression, but against the strict religious rules, they talk openly into the camera…
